name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Pie
description: A giant chocolate chip cookie baked in a pie dish.
recipeIngredient: 8 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease a 9 inch pie dish.
In a small bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, beat together butter, brown sugar, and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add vanilla and eggs and beat until combined.
Add flour mixture to wet ingredients and beat until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips.
Press dough evenly across prepared pie dish. Bake until golden, about 20 minutes.
